Package com.fromlabs.inventory.inventoryservice.common.exception.handler

Interface ExceptionHandler<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - A generic type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RequestExceptionHandler
    public interface ExceptionHandler<T>
    Exception Handler are created to solve the issue which define a united way to handle all type of exception while developer handle the process business logic

    The simple ideas are that developer can define the strategy for solving each type of exception just only once and the rest will follow the predefined rules

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ExceptionHandler<T> config​(ExceptionHandlerConfiguration cnf)
      Configuration is set up so that the strategy and rule are applied to solve any predefined exception
